comment:
* Helper class to apply surface transactions in sync with RenderThread.
 * @hide

methods.name: public void scheduleApply(final SurfaceParams... params)
methods.comment:
* Schedules applying surface parameters on the next frame.
     *
     * @param params The surface parameters to apply. DO NOT MODIFY the list after passing into
     *               this method to avoid synchronization issues.

methods.name: void applyParams(Transaction t, long frame, final SurfaceParams... params)
methods.comment:
* Applies surface parameters on the next frame.
     * @param t transaction to apply all parameters in.
     * @param frame frame to synchronize to. Set -1 when sync is not required.
     * @param params The surface parameters to apply. DO NOT MODIFY the list after passing into
     *               this method to avoid synchronization issues.

methods.name: public static void applyParams(Transaction t, SurfaceParams params, float[] tmpFloat9)
public static void create(final View targetView, final Consumer<SyncRtSurfaceTransactionApplier> callback)
methods.comment:
* Creates an instance of SyncRtSurfaceTransactionApplier, deferring until the target view is
     * attached if necessary.

methodNames: void applyParams(Transaction t, long frame, final SurfaceParams... params)
public static void applyParams(Transaction t, SurfaceParams params, float[] tmpFloat9)
